runs.comm: on a good length outside off stump, Tamim waits on the back foot and opens the face of the bat to run the ball to third man
Asif strays on to leg stump, Junaid gets off the mark by flicking it off his pads down to fine leg
good length delivery on off stump, Junaid gets on to the front foot and defends towards cover
dropped, Junaid tries to pull a ball that isn't short, he mis-hits it and the ball lobs up towards midwicket where Misbah is late in moving back for the catch, the ball goes over his head
Asif strays down leg side, that's the first extra of the innings
Asif's bowling well below his usual speed, full on leg stump, Junaid tries to flick but misses and is hit on  the pad
Junaid moves forward and drives a length delivery from off stump elegantly through cover point for the first boundary for Bangladesh
he starts off with a wide outside off stump
excellent length outside the off stump, Tamim gets drawn into the front-foot drive and the ball beats the outside edge
fuller length on off stump, Tamim moves forward and drives to cover, he didn't hit that from the middle of the bat
Tanvir over-steps and bowls a good length ball on middle stumps, tucked off the pads towards midwicket, free hit coming up, Junaid can't be out in any other way than run out off the next ball
Tanvir tries to bowl the slower ball but lets loose a slow beamer which Junaid ducks under, the free hit will carry over to the next ball
bowled full and straight, Junaid comes down the track and drives back to the bowler
pitches just short of a length on off stump and seams away from the left-hander, Junaid tries to defend on the front foot but gets beaten
defended off the front foot towards Afridi at extra cover
Junaid moves forward and across and tries to hit Tanvir across the line of the ball towards the leg side, he misses and gets hit on the pad but it's too high for an lbw appeal
Asif floats it through at 107 kmh outside leg stump, that's another wide, Asif is bowling well below par here
that's 130 kmh outside the off stump, Tamim gets forward and pushes the ball to point
another slow ball on middle stump, Tamim defends back to Asif on the front foot
short of a length delivery pitches on middle stump and angles across the left-hander, played off the back foot towards Hafeez at point
full delivery on leg stump, Tamim leans across and flicks the ball off his pads past short fine leg

a direct hit and Tamim has to go! Junaid played the ball towards point and called for the single, Tamim responded but Hafeez quickly swooped down on the ball and threw down the stumps at the batsman's end with Tamim well short
pushed towards point off the front foot
played with an open face towards third man
bowled wide outside off stump
driven towards mid-off off the front foot
Tanvir bowls a full ball on leg stump, Junaid moves towards the off and flicks towards fine leg where Nazir runs to his left and stops the ball with his boot
defended towards cover point off the front foot
Junaid walks down the pitch to a good length ball and hits it into the gap between midwicket and mid-on, he hasn't timed that well but the placement will fetch two
excellent shot! Junaid takes a step down, gets to the pitch of the ball and drives between extra cover and mid-off for four, now that was perfectly timed
Aftab tries to charge Asif and loft him back over the head, Asif bowls it a little shorter and just misses Aftab's leg stump
short of a length outside off stump, this time Aftab stays in his crease and guides the ball towards third man
shot! Junaid uses his feet to step down the pitch and take the ball on the full, he frees his arms and drives straight past Asif to the long-on boundary
Asif bowls a loopy slow ball on leg stump, Junaid moves across his stumps and flicks past short fine leg for four more, poor line when that fielder is in the circle
Junaid charges Asif once again but this time he's a bit too early, allowing Asif to bang the ball in short, Junaid lets the ball go past him
this time Junaid uses his feet to good effect, he gets to the pitch of the ball and lofts it over mid-off, he hasn't timed that well enough and Malik pulls it back just inside the boundary
Aftab pulls to square leg for a single, they run the single but a direct hit from Younis at the bowler's end allows the over throw off the ricochet
Aftab moves down the track and pulls down to deep backward square leg for a single

dropped, Junaid tries to loft a full ball over deep square leg but doesn't hit it well at all, he hits it in the air towards square leg, Nazir is late in getting to the ball and though he makes a valiant dive, he can't quite reach it
short ball and Junaid makes superb contact with the pull and sends the ball sailing into the midwicket stands
full toss outside off stump, Junaid plays the square drive off the front foot to cover point
Tanvir strays down leg side, that's another wide
Aftab tries to flick through the leg side but misses, he gets an inside edge which rolls past the stumps
defended on the front foot back to the bowler
that was the offspinner from Afridi which angled across Junaid, played to short third man
pushed off the pads towards the vacant space at midwicket for an easy two
tossed up on off stump, Aftab leans forward and defends towards the offside, Junaid wants the single but Aftab sends him back
played off the pads through square leg
Junaid uses his feet to come down the pitch and loft Afridi down the ground, he didn't connect well enough to beat the fielder at long-off
tossed up on middle and leg stump, Junaid plays the ball towards square leg off the front foot
bowled quicker and flatter on off and middle stump, Aftab flicks it behind square for one more
driven towards long-on off the front foot
flighted delivery on middle and off, that one stopped on Junaid who defended it back to Hafeez off the front foot
driven towards long-on for a single
Aftab comes down the pitch and flicks the ball through midwicket
quicker ball from Afridi, Aftab tries to sweep but gets beaten and bottom edges it to short fine leg
Junaid uses his feet to get to the pitch of the ball and with a free swing of his arms, he lofts Afridi over midwicket, the ball bounces just inside the rope
dabbed towards the off side for  a quick single
played towards short third man for one more
dropped, Junaid tries to clear the straight boundary this time but hits it towards Gul on the boundary who makes a hash of it, the ball hits his hand, bounces once and goes over the boundary
pushed towards short midwicket for  a single
driven towards mid-off for a single, Junaid brings up his fifty, extremely well-played
Aftab tries to reverse sweep but misses and gets hit on the pad outside off stump
short and wide outside off stump, Junaid cuts off the back foot to deep point
stumped! Aftab charges down the track and has a wild swing over midwicket, Hafeez drags his length a little short and fires in a quick delivery, Aftab misses and Akmal completes an easy stumping
driven to long-off for a single to end the over
squeezed down to third-man
lofted inside out and over cover but it's a gently shot and won't go all the way

flatter, quicker, on the stumps, Ashraful plays around his front pad and fails to make contact. That's always dangerous. Afridi appeals strongly and the finger goes up. That pitched in line and wasn't turning much at all. Can't complain about the decision
fuller and on the pads, worked to the on side with a wristy flick
straighter one, just outside the off, the left-handed batsman feels for it as it slips past the outside edge
short of a good length and on the off, defended watchfully
short of a length and outside the off, quite flat, pulled but straight back to the bowler
down leg side, played at and missed, wide called

tossed up and on the stumps, Hafeez just holds that one back a touch and Shakib al Hasan is too early on the shot. He closes the face of the bat and the ball loops off the leading edge straight back to the bowler for the simplest of catches
tossed up and outside the off, eased to cover with soft hands for a quick single
Biggie! Junaid launches into this one, crashing the ball over midwicket after a shimmy down the pitch. That is a cracker
Almost a repeat! Junaid comes down again and even though the ball is dragged down short it is launched into the stands over midwicket. Quality batting that
Again Junaid comes down the pitch. This time Hafeez sends the ball short and wife. Junaid adjusts and chops the ball down towards third-man
outside the off, straight ball, played at and missed, through to the keeper
slightly slower, tossed up, on the stumps, defended watchfully
flatter and on the off, the batsman opens the face of the bat and runs the ball to cover
quicker ball, it's bang on target, homing in on the off stump, defended towards off
slipping down leg, heaved over the on side but it's just a single
googly outside the off, big flash and a miss, through to the keeper past the inside edge
low full-toss on the stumps, swatted away to the leg side as Umar Gul begins his spell
another one that is fairly straight and not express, worked away to the on side
just short of a good length and on the pads, awkward pull played. The ball bobs up towards the on side
full and straight, Gul striving for the yorker, a bit of late swing, defended towards the off side. Not much the batsman can do with that one
another one that's full and straight, clipped down to fine-leg for another single
fullish and outside the off, driven well through cover but there's a fielder on the ropes

Another one bites the dust. Down the track and heaved over the infield. That one isn't struck too well, though, and it will just float down the throar of Misbah-ul-Haq in the deep. End of an excellent innings from Junaid in his first game of this tournament
full and on the stumps, clipped away to the on side off the toes
tossed up and on the stumps, driven back to the bowler. It's a no-ball, and a ree hit to come. Unforgiveable really, Shoaib Malik bowling no-balls with his run-up
Heaved away over the infield and that's four. Full use of the free hit.
short of a good length and outside the off, Nadif Chowdhury goes for the big cut but can only get a thick outside edge on that. Well snapped up by the keeper
flat and on the pads, defended to on
eased down to long-off for a single to end the over
short one dug in on the off stump, Mortaza goes back and defends the ball to leg

very full and on the stumps, attempted yorker from Gul. It's well dug out by Mashrafe Mortaza. Mahmudullah wants the single and sprints down the pitch. Unfortunately the ball deflects of Mahmudullah and goes straight to Gul. Gul picks up and throws down the stumps and that's another wicket gone
very full and on the stumps, prised out to the on side
short of a good length and outside the off, good pace on this, flashy cut played and missed
full and straight again, played defensively to the leg side
very full and on the stumps, the batsman goes a bit to leg and opens the face of the bat to run the ball to the off side
tossed up and on the off, huge heave played, the ball goes off the toe of the bat over the bowler's head
full-toss on the stumps, mis-hit back over the bowler's head and it's another brace
flat, full and on the stumps, defended awkwardly back down the pitch
once again very full and on the pads, driven down to the on side
back of a length and outside the off, defended down towards the bowler with soft hands
eased down towards wide long-on
short of a good length, once again decent pace, Gul doing well here, played at and missed, through to the keeper
full and straight, just a hint of inswing, Gul striving for the yorker, driven to the off side

Mortaza walks to off then backs to leg, trying to make some room for himself. Gul follows the batsman really well and bangs it in short, nailing Mortaza on the helmet. That is a superb bit of bowling.
full and outside the off, squeezed down to third-man
No-ball and it's hit well through cover too. Half stop from the fielder makes sure it doesn't go away to the boundary. Free hit coming up.
full and straight, Gul again aiming for the yorker, Mortaza back s away to leg and hits through cover
short one banged in, slipping down leg, ducked under. Gul lucky that wasn't called wide

very very very slow from Asif who returns to the attack. That one hangs in the air an eternity before finding the base of leg stump as Mortaza walks far to the off and tries to hit that over leg. That's a bit of a mess for the batsman.

yet another slower ball, on the off, defended back down the pitch. Asif fields in his follow-through and finds Razzaq bounding down the crease. Asif under-arms the ball onto the stumps at the striker's end and that's curtains for Razzaq. Silly way to throw away a wicket
full and on the stumps, defended sensibly back down the pitch
fullish and on the stumps, once again defended very carefully to the off side
fullish and on the stumps, driven through the on side
fullish and on the stumps, worked to the on side to end a frenetic over
short of a length and outside the off, slashed quite agriculturally at, the ball balloons down towards long off
slightly quicker, outside the off, the ball skids through as the batsman has a swing and misses quite comfortably
very full and on the stumps. All the batsman can do is jam the bat down and defend to the keeper

searing yorker on the middle stump. Syed Rasel has very little idea about that one and plays a booming shot nowhere near the vicinity of the ball. The middle stump is disturbed and that's the end of the Bangladesh innings
